abstract: SAC Capital Advisors is said to be considering a plea deal to resolve an insider trading case. | Some American corporations are reducing their taxes by buying a foreign company. | The government’s cost to borrow money for a month rose on Tuesday to its highest level since 2008. | Twitter’s prospectus for an initial public offering reveals a company acting like an adult.
snippet: SAC Capital Advisors is said to be considering a plea deal to resolve an insider trading case. | Some American corporations are reducing their taxes by buying a foreign company. | The government’s cost to borrow money for a month rose on Tuesday t...
lead_paragraph: SAC IS SAID TO WEIGH PLEA DEAL  |  The hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors, after months of fighting the government’s insider trading case, is leaning toward admitting criminal wrongdoing and agreeing to pay a record financial penalty to resolve the charges, DealBook’s Peter Lattman reports. Federal prosecutors have taken an aggressive stance in settlement talks with SAC, according to two people briefed on the deliberations.

abstract: No-contract cellphone plans are on the rise, with plenty of options available. Making the best choice means doing your research before making any move.
snippet: No-contract cellphone plans are on the rise, with plenty of options available. Making the best choice means doing your research before making any move.
lead_paragraph: Just a few years ago, buying a cellphone without a contract was both unfashionable and largely unfeasible. No-contract options were available but getting your hands on the latest phones and the best data plans usually required a two-year contract.

headline.main: Going Contract-Free: Finding a Phone and Plan That Fit
headline.print_headline: The Freedom, and the Details, Of Going Contract-Free
